    • Method Detail

      • load_new_map

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> load_new_map(int level,
                                                          processing.data.JSONArray levels)
        Loading in a new map from a given JSONArray and level number.
        Parameters:
        level - The current level the player is on.
        levels - The JSONArray of each levels details.
        Returns:
        List of the map layout.

      • load_characters

        public int load_characters(Sprite character,
                           int player_current_state,
                           java.lang.String file1,
                           java.lang.String file2,
                           java.lang.String file3,
                           java.lang.String file4)
        Loading in a character into the map.
        Parameters:
        character - The object of characters class (a character).
        player_current_state - The current state of the player (1,2,3,4).
        file1 - The string path of the png of animation 1.
        file2 - The string path of the png of animation 2.
        file3 - The string path of the png of animation 3.
        file4 - The string path of the png of animation 4.
        Returns:
        The player current state integer.

      • check_collision

        public boolean check_collision(Sprite character,
                               int key_code)
        Checking if player or enemy movement results in a collision with a wall.
        Parameters:
        character - The object of characters class (a character).
        key_code - The direction which the character is intending to move in.
        Returns:
        True if player can move, false if otherwise.

      • setBlockValues

        public java.lang.String setBlockValues(Explosion explosion,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<Wall> walls,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<Broken> brokens)
        Set the tile underneath each part of a particular explosion.
        Parameters:
        explosion - The given explosion.
        walls - The list of all the walls on the map.
        brokens - The list of all the broken tiles on the map.
        Returns:
        The tile underneath the given explosion.
